name: Dot Matrix
description:
An arcade style Roguelike shooter inspired by The Binding of Isaac! Play as Dotty, as he lives out the rest of his impossible life in a futile effort to survive limbo!

This game includes:

- 4 difficulty settings from "Easy" to "WHY"
- A customizable Gameboy/Calculator aesthetic with options to change the color pallet of the game and enable/disable the matrix grid.
- Controller support! (Mouse required for menus)
- Rooms and upgrades that are randomly selected every play-through!
- Dynamic difficulty scaling! The enemies get stronger and so do you!
- Over 30 levels for the game to randomly select!
- 4 different kinds of upgrades and 3 "Trade Rooms" where you can trade the ones you don't need for ones that you do!
- NO ENDING, AND LOTS OF DYING.

Life is unpredictable, Death is inevitable.

DOT MATRIX.
